jsQuestions.title: Replace With Alphabet Position
jsQuestions.question: Given a string, replace every letter with its position in the alphabet. If anything in the text isn't a letter, ignore it and don't return it.

jsQuestions.title: Add to Front
jsQuestions.question: Given an array and an element, the function 'addToFront' adds the given element to the front of the given array, and returns the given array.

jsQuestions.title: Add Object Property
jsQuestions.question: Given two objects and a key, the function 'addObjectProperty' sets a new property on the 1st object at the given key. The value of that new property is the entire 2nd object.

jsQuestions.title: Join Arrays of Arrays
jsQuestions.question: Given an array of arrays, the function 'joinArrayOfArrays' returns a single array containing the elements of the nested arrays.

jsQuestions.title: Count Characters in a String
jsQuestions.question: Given a string input and a character, the function 'countCharacter' returns the number of occurrences of a given character in the given string.

jsQuestions.title: Square All Elements in an Array
jsQuestions.question: Given a array of numbers, the function 'squareElements' should return a new array where each element is the square of the element of the given array.

jsQuestions.title: Get the Length of Two Words
jsQuestions.question: Given 2 words, the function 'getLengthOfTwoWords' returns the sum of their lengths.

jsQuestions.title: Get All Elements But the Nth
jsQuestions.question: Given an array and an index, the function 'getAllElementsButNth' returns an array with all the elements but the nth.

jsQuestions.title: Extend
jsQuestions.question: Given two objects, 'extend' adds properties from the 2nd object to the 1st object.

jsQuestions.title: Repeat String
jsQuestions.question: Given a string and a number, the function 'repeatString' returns the given string repeated the given number of times.

htmlQuestions.title: Get All Elements But the Nth
htmlQuestions.question: Given an array and an index, the function 'getAllElementsButNth' returns an array with all the elements but the nth.

htmlQuestions.title: Extend
htmlQuestions.question: Given two objects, 'extend' adds properties from the 2nd object to the 1st object.

htmlQuestions.title: Repeat String
htmlQuestions.question: Given a string and a number, the function 'repeatString' returns the given string repeated the given number of times.

cssQuestions.question: Given two objects, 'extend' adds properties from the 2nd object to the 1st object.

cssQuestions.title: Repeat String
cssQuestions.question: Given a string and a number, the function 'repeatString' returns the given string repeated the given number of times.

dsaQuestions.title: Extend
dsaQuestions.question: Given two objects, 'extend' adds properties from the 2nd object to the 1st object.

dsaQuestions.title: Repeat String
dsaQuestions.question: Given a string and a number, the function 'repeatString' returns the given string repeated the given number of times.
